titles: An ansvvere to VVilliam Alablaster [sic] his motiues. By Roger Fenton preacher of Grayes Inne
author: Fenton, Roger, 1565-1616.
Alabaster, William, 1567-1640.
publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, for W. Aspley, dwelling in Paules Churchyard, at the signe of the Tygers head,
notes: An answer to an unknown work by William Alabaster, possibly entitled "Seven motives", printing sections of it.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
